data.rationale:
This module is used to automatically inflate text columns in a
    DBIx::Class::Schema to a Markup::Unified object (I've just
    registered this module too), so that columns that hold text
    formatted with Textile, Markdown or BBCode can be automatically
    processed into the resulting HTML.

    Unfortunately, DBIx::Class seems to be missing a feature that
    automatically processed formatted text columns, which are very
    common in web applications these days. So that's why I created this
    module and think it should be added to the module list.
